summary: Every 2 years, we report on federal programs and operations that are vulnerable to waste, fraud, abuse, and mismanagement, or that need broad reform—our High Risk List . Our 2019 report reviews the status of areas on the list and outlines steps to lasting solutions. The ratings for over half of the 35 areas on our list remain unchanged. Since our last update, 7 areas...
title: High-Risk Series: Substantial Efforts Needed to Achieve Greater Progress on High-Risk Areas
